entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
